org.sd.text
Class EditDistance

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.text.EditDistance

public class EditDistance
extends java.lang.Object

Utility to compute the edit distance between two strings.

Author:
Spence Koehler

levAbbrev

public static int levAbbrev(java.lang.String abbrev,
                            java.lang.String full)
Modified algorithm to not penalize for char additions from abbrev to full.

Algorithm: if abbrev is longer than full, compute normal lev; if full starts with abbrev (ignoring any trailing . on abbrev), then the score is 0. Otherwise, the score is computed by levVowel.

levAbbrev

public static final int levAbbrev(char[] a,
                                  char[] b)
Modified algorithm to not penalize for char additions from abbrev to full.

Algorithm: if abbrev is longer than full or the first chars do not agree, return -1; otherwise, count chars in abbrev that are not in full (in sequence). If abbrev has a period, inc to next word in full to keep matching.

main
